reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made with a flattering shape that accentuates curves, and they appreciate its versatility as a dress that can be dressed up or down. The dress receives positive feedback for its comfort, with one customer noting it's suitable for summer heat, and they like its fit and pockets. The fabric quality and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some find the material nice, others describe it as plastic-like, and while some say it's true to size, others report it runs small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, perfect material.
items.body: This dress fit well, and you don't have to iron as long as you hang it after drying. It is the perfect dress for work to be stylish (good pattern) and humble. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, Flattering Dress
items.body: Lovely dress; very flowy and flattering. It arrived in a freeze bag, scrunched up, so I was suspicious. However, it unfolded nicely. Read more
items.author: Sandy's Toy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, great deal for the price.
items.body: The things I really like about this dress are, first of all, it looks great, the print is beautiful, I love the style, this dress is very flattering, and I also love that it has pockets, huge bonus for me. I am 5ft 2in, 137 lbs. 36-D bra size. I ordered this dress in a medium, it does fit and it looks great, but it is a little tight at the waist. I does fit me a lot better when I wear shape wear underneath. It looks like it fits perfect. A large may have been better for my size though, but I worry a large would look too big, and not as fitted (I don‚Äôt know because I haven‚Äôt tried the large). The dress is mid-calf length on me, which I think is perfect. This dress does have two downfalls for me, both of which I might not have if I had gotten the large instead of medium, but I once again, I don‚Äôt know because I have not tried it on in a large. The first is that it was very tricky to zip up, I could not zip it up myself, I had to get my spouse to zip it for me. The other downfall for me is that I do have slightly limited range of motion in my shoulders and upper arms in this dress, it does not fit me quite right in the underarm area, which does limit my arm movements a little. For the most part this is not a problem because most of the time I am going someplace that I need to be dressed nice, I don‚Äôt need to move my arms that much, but it would make it hard to hold a baby or toddler, or dance, and it also makes it so it would be hard for me to wear to work. I would say the quality of this dress is medium, it is not a super high quality fabric, but it is not low quality either. The fabric is thin, but not see through, and I have no complaints about the quality of fabric or the stitching. Overall, I am very pleased with this dress, it is beautiful, very flattering, and very good deal for the price. Read more
items.author: jefferson greenwood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress and good quality
items.body: Fit good and the color everything is gorgeous ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ Read more
items.author: Florence Tossou

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A Dress That Could Be Better
items.body: I should have read through all the reviews and remembered the fitting issues others had before getting this dress. One reviewer mentioned that she had to keep pulling it down to fit at the waist and that is exactly what I had an issue with. The color and print was very pretty and flattering, not too garish and it looked nice for the occasion I wore it to. It could very easily be worn to a wedding, dinner out, party or special occasion and it could also work in an office. But because I have a short waist, it didn‚Äôt fit as comfortably as I would have liked, I will probably not wear this as often as I‚Äôd hoped. But it‚Äôs a nice enough dress to keep and not return. I would consider getting a size up for a bit more room but worried it would be too big and fall off the shoulders, so the size was close. The pockets are a nice touch and certainly not common in dresses. I would say overall it is a good dress for the price and a good value but it really does have a few minor things that prevent me from wanting more than one color. Length of the dress was below the knee and I did like that. At least the way the dress is made it didn‚Äôt show the issues with not fitting the waist as it should. Read more
items.author: P. Cuties2b

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Pockets are the cherry on top! üçí
items.body: Super functional, super versatile super cute dress that you can dress up or down, for work or play! Includes comfortable pockets for phone, lipgloss and keys (at least that‚Äôs what I used it for!), while still maintaining shape of the dress, and not sagging the sides. Like, honestly you can‚Äôt even tell that there are pockets of that anything is in them! It does have a zipper in the back, but the head-hole was stretchy enough for me to pull it over my head, and flory enough to hide a little tummy of you have one! I am wearing a Medium (5‚Äô8‚Äù - 185 lbs). Definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: @JPdaReallest

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect dress.
items.body: The fit is beautiful. It is incredibly flattering and comfortable. Putting stuff in the pockets does not cause it to sit weirdly. I thought I would need a slip under this but it is not at all see-through at all. I want one in every color. Read more
items.author: Samantha Ball

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but slightly stiff material
items.body: The dress is as beautiful as pictured but the material was thicker than I would like. It doesn't flow as well and feels stiff which is the only reason I didn't give this dress 5 stars. Otherwise it is a beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: Marita

short_description:
Womens Dress Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, 2 3327blue/Pink Flower, Elastic Material-3310navy, 3159navy/Red&yellow Flower, 3364 Black/White Flower, Elastic Material-3310gray, Navy/White,flower, White/Floral1, Elastic Material-3310black, 3365 Black/Yellow Flower, 3155ms, Dark Blue/Black Graphics, 2 3337 Coffee/Sketch Flower, 2 3338 Blue/White Flower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
